PATHANAMTHITTA

Pathanamthitta is a district in the south-eastern part of Kerala, known for its natural beauty, religious significance, and cultural diversity. It is a place where you can experience the heritage, festivals, and cuisine of Kerala, as well as enjoy the scenic forests, waterfalls, and hills. Here are some of the tourist attractions in Pathanamthitta district that you can visit:
